sourcesContent:
const drinksData = [
    {
        id: 1,
        name: "Spanish Latte",
        description: "A rich and creamy coffee drink that combines espresso with sweetened condensed milk, creating a perfect balance of bold coffee flavor and sweetness.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 shots of espresso",
                "2 tbsp sweetened condensed milk",
                "1/2 cup steamed milk",
                "Ice (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Pull two shots of espresso",
                "Add sweetened condensed milk to the cup",
                "Pour the espresso over the condensed milk and stir",
                "Top with steamed milk",
                "Add ice if making iced version"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Creamy",
            "Sweet",
            "Caramel-like",
            "Smooth"
        ],
        origin: "Spain",
        variations: [
            "Iced Spanish Latte",
            "Dirty Spanish Latte (with extra espresso)",
            "Coconut Spanish Latte"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1561047029-3000c68339ca?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 2,
        name: "Matcha Latte",
        description: "A vibrant green tea latte made with finely ground matcha powder, offering a perfect balance of earthy flavors and creamy texture.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 tsp matcha powder",
                "2 tbsp hot water",
                "1 cup steamed milk",
                "1 tsp honey or sweetener (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Sift matcha powder into a cup",
                "Add hot water and whisk until frothy",
                "Heat and froth the milk",
                "Pour the milk over the matcha mixture",
                "Add sweetener if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Earthy",
            "Creamy",
            "Slightly Bitter",
            "Umami"
        ],
        origin: "Japan",
        variations: [
            "Iced Matcha Latte",
            "Matcha Frappuccino",
            "Matcha with Coconut Milk"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1564890369478-c89ca6d9cde9?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 3,
        name: "Dalgona Coffee",
        description: "A viral Korean coffee drink featuring a fluffy, whipped coffee topping that sits on top of iced milk.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 tbsp instant coffee",
                "2 tbsp sugar",
                "2 tbsp hot water",
                "1 cup milk",
                "Ice"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Mix instant coffee, sugar, and hot water",
                "Whip until thick and creamy",
                "Fill a glass with ice and milk",
                "Top with the whipped coffee mixture"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Sweet",
            "Creamy",
            "Strong Coffee Flavor",
            "Light and Fluffy"
        ],
        origin: "South Korea",
        variations: [
            "Dalgona Matcha",
            "Dalgona Chocolate",
            "Dalgona with Almond Milk"
        ],
        image: "https://media.istockphoto.com/id/1219154690/photo/iced-dalgona-coffee-on-wooden-table.jpg?s=2048x2048&w=is&k=20&c=MVybyEx6ngAJt8K6CncDwuXlH7VKggTQck8H_36txZQ="
    },
    {
        id: 4,
        name: "Vietnamese Iced Coffee",
        description: "A strong, sweet coffee drink made with dark roast coffee and sweetened condensed milk, served over ice.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 tbsp Vietnamese coffee grounds",
                "2 tbsp sweetened condensed milk",
                "Hot water",
                "Ice"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Place coffee grounds in a phin filter",
                "Add hot water and let drip",
                "Add condensed milk to a glass",
                "Pour coffee over condensed milk",
                "Add ice and stir"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Strong",
            "Sweet",
            "Bold",
            "Creamy"
        ],
        origin: "Vietnam",
        variations: [
            "Hot Vietnamese Coffee",
            "Coconut Vietnamese Coffee",
            "Vietnamese Coffee with Egg"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1559056199-641a0ac8b55e?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 5,
        name: "Affogato",
        description: "A simple yet elegant Italian dessert coffee made by pouring a shot of hot espresso over a scoop of vanilla ice cream.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 shot of espresso",
                "1 scoop vanilla ice cream",
                "Optional: chocolate shavings or caramel sauce"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Scoop vanilla ice cream into a glass",
                "Pull a shot of espresso",
                "Pour hot espresso over the ice cream",
                "Add toppings if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Sweet",
            "Creamy",
            "Bitter",
            "Cold and Hot"
        ],
        origin: "Italy",
        variations: [
            "Chocolate Affogato",
            "Caramel Affogato",
            "Hazelnut Affogato"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1572442388796-11668a67e53d?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 6,
        name: "Cortado",
        description: "A Spanish coffee drink that consists of equal parts espresso and warm milk, creating a perfect balance of strength and creaminess.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 shot of espresso",
                "Equal amount of steamed milk"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Pull a shot of espresso",
                "Steam milk to about 150°F",
                "Pour equal parts milk into the espresso"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Balanced",
            "Smooth",
            "Mild",
            "Creamy"
        ],
        origin: "Spain",
        variations: [
            "Gibraltar (slightly different ratio)",
            "Cortado with Condensed Milk",
            "Iced Cortado"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 7,
        name: "Flat White",
        description: "A coffee drink consisting of espresso with microfoam, similar to a latte but with a higher proportion of coffee to milk.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 shots of espresso",
                "4 oz steamed milk with microfoam"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Pull two shots of espresso",
                "Steam milk to create microfoam",
                "Pour milk over espresso, holding back the foam",
                "Spoon a thin layer of foam on top"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Strong",
            "Creamy",
            "Smooth",
            "Balanced"
        ],
        origin: "Australia/New Zealand",
        variations: [
            "Iced Flat White",
            "Long Black",
            "Magic (Melbourne style)"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 8,
        name: "Turkish Coffee",
        description: "A traditional method of preparing coffee where finely ground coffee beans are boiled in a pot, creating a strong, unfiltered coffee with a unique texture.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 tsp finely ground coffee",
                "1 cup water",
                "Sugar (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Add water and coffee to cezve",
                "Heat slowly until foam forms",
                "Remove from heat when foam rises",
                "Let grounds settle before serving"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Strong",
            "Full-bodied",
            "Spicy",
            "Rich"
        ],
        origin: "Turkey",
        variations: [
            "Cardamom Turkish Coffee",
            "Iced Turkish Coffee",
            "Turkish Coffee with Milk"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 9,
        name: "Café au Lait",
        description: "A French coffee drink made with equal parts brewed coffee and steamed milk, typically served in a large cup.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1/2 cup brewed coffee",
                "1/2 cup steamed milk"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Brew coffee using your preferred method",
                "Steam milk until hot and frothy",
                "Pour equal parts coffee and milk into a cup"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Mild",
            "Creamy",
            "Smooth",
            "Balanced"
        ],
        origin: "France",
        variations: [
            "Iced Café au Lait",
            "Café au Lait with Flavored Syrup",
            "Café au Lait with Whipped Cream"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 10,
        name: "Irish Coffee",
        description: "A cocktail consisting of hot coffee, Irish whiskey, and sugar, topped with cream.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 cup hot coffee",
                "1.5 oz Irish whiskey",
                "1 tsp brown sugar",
                "Heavy cream"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Preheat glass with hot water",
                "Add whiskey and sugar",
                "Pour in hot coffee",
                "Top with lightly whipped cream"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Rich",
            "Creamy",
            "Whiskey-forward",
            "Sweet"
        ],
        origin: "Ireland",
        variations: [
            "Baileys Coffee",
            "Irish Coffee with Chocolate",
            "Iced Irish Coffee"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 11,
        name: "Café Cubano",
        description: "A type of espresso that originated in Cuba, characterized by its strong flavor and sweet taste from sugar whipped with the first drops of espresso.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "2 tbsp finely ground coffee",
                "2 tsp sugar",
                "2 oz water"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Add sugar to espresso cup",
                "Pull first few drops of espresso",
                "Whip sugar with espresso drops",
                "Complete the espresso shot"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Strong",
            "Sweet",
            "Bold",
            "Caramel-like"
        ],
        origin: "Cuba",
        variations: [
            "Cortadito (with steamed milk)",
            "Café con Leche",
            "Colada (large serving)"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 12,
        name: "Vienna Coffee",
        description: "A traditional coffee drink from Vienna, consisting of strong black coffee topped with whipped cream.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 cup strong black coffee",
                "Whipped cream",
                "Chocolate shavings (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Brew strong black coffee",
                "Top with whipped cream",
                "Add chocolate shavings if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Rich",
            "Creamy",
            "Bold",
            "Sweet"
        ],
        origin: "Austria",
        variations: [
            "Vienna Coffee with Liqueur",
            "Iced Vienna Coffee",
            "Vienna Coffee with Cinnamon"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 13,
        name: "Café Bombón",
        description: "A Spanish coffee drink made with equal parts espresso and sweetened condensed milk, creating a layered effect.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 shot of espresso",
                "Equal amount of sweetened condensed milk"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Pour condensed milk into a glass",
                "Pull a shot of espresso",
                "Pour espresso over the condensed milk",
                "Serve without stirring"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Sweet",
            "Creamy",
            "Strong",
            "Caramel-like"
        ],
        origin: "Spain",
        variations: [
            "Iced Café Bombón",
            "Café Bombón with Cinnamon",
            "Café Bombón with Chocolate"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 14,
        name: "Café Mocha",
        description: "A chocolate-flavored variant of a latte, made with espresso, steamed milk, and chocolate.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 shot of espresso",
                "1 oz chocolate syrup",
                "8 oz steamed milk",
                "Whipped cream (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Add chocolate syrup to cup",
                "Pull a shot of espresso",
                "Add steamed milk",
                "Top with whipped cream if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Chocolatey",
            "Creamy",
            "Sweet",
            "Rich"
        ],
        origin: "United States",
        variations: [
            "White Chocolate Mocha",
            "Peppermint Mocha",
            "Iced Mocha"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    },
    {
        id: 15,
        name: "Café con Miel",
        description: "A Spanish coffee drink made with espresso, honey, and cinnamon, creating a sweet and spicy flavor profile.",
        recipe: {
            ingredients: [
                "1 shot of espresso",
                "1 tbsp honey",
                "1/4 tsp cinnamon",
                "Steamed milk (optional)"
            ],
            steps: [
                "Add honey to cup",
                "Sprinkle cinnamon",
                "Pull a shot of espresso",
                "Add steamed milk if desired"
            ]
        },
        tastingNotes: [
            "Sweet",
            "Spicy",
            "Warm",
            "Complex"
        ],
        origin: "Spain",
        variations: [
            "Iced Café con Miel",
            "Café con Miel with Orange",
            "Café con Miel with Vanilla"
        ],
        image: "https://images.unsplash.com/photo-1517705008128-361805f42e86?w=800"
    }
];

export default drinksData;
